Agent_completed.name: Agent_completed
Agent_completed.description: Notifies that the user request has completed and there is no more work to be done, or that no more useful progress can be made with the functions.

parameters.name: note
parameters.description: A detailed description that answers/completes the user request.

Agent_saveMemory.name: Agent_saveMemory
Agent_saveMemory.description: Stores content to your working memory, and continues on with the plan. You can assume the memory element now contains this key and content.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: A descriptive identifier (alphanumeric and underscores allowed, under 30 characters) for the new memory contents explaining the source of the content. This must not exist in the current memory.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The plain text contents to store in the working memory

Agent_deleteMemory.name: Agent_deleteMemory
Agent_deleteMemory.description:
Updates existing content in your working memory, and continues on with the plan. You can assume the memory element now contains this key and content.
Note this will over-write any existing memory content

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: An existing key in the memory contents to update the contents of.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: An existing key in the memory to retrieve.
